content: You may proceed with your question. But even after all of that and assuming even a fairly healthy multiple on and what's an injectable deal or something along those lines highlighted in your Analyst Day, you're going to have a few 100 -- 500 of millions left, if not a little bit higher depending on mid-year free cash flow generation. You may proceed with your question. You may proceed with your question. There's been a lot -- besides this pricing, mix improvement has been a big driver and what we're trying to look at is looking at our market strategy on our business given our footprint and the profile that we have, that as the cycle changes, we'll end up with a better position because of the strategic changes that we've done. You may proceed with your question. You may proceed with your question. You may proceed with your question.
